item.title: [PI 317] Urgent! [PI 317]
item.dc:creator: @Army123 Army123
item.description:
@Army123 wrote:

the server is offline.

i made it possible for multi ip log in.

so i doubled logged in.

my admin account typed the command, my non-admin account couldnt see nothing.

but back on my admin account screen it shows it to me, but not to my other acc.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI 317] Urgent! [PI 317]
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Army123, post:1, topic:431154”]how do i make a command, that everyone will see?

for example.

this is what i have came up with so far, but it seems like it only shows on my screen but not my other?..

if (playerCommand.startswith(“noob”) && c.playerRights >= 2) {
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
c2.sendMessage(“everyone is a nub!”);
}[/quote]

Have you asked the other players if they can see it?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI 317] Urgent! [PI 317]
item.dc:creator: @jaruanna jaruanna
item.description:
@jaruanna wrote:

change c2.sendMessage to c2.sendMessageToAll

Read full topic

item.title: [PI 317] Urgent! [PI 317]
item.dc:creator: @Army123 Army123
item.description:
@Army123 wrote:

how do i make a command, that everyone will see?

for example.

this is what i have came up with so far, but it seems like it only shows on my screen but not my other?..

if (playerCommand.startswith(“noob”) && c.playerRights >= 2) {
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
c2.sendMessage(“everyone is a nub!”);
}
